articles.content: How do old cells in adult humans give rise to the youthful cells found in infants? New research suggests they reset to their lowest biological age in early embryonic development, with potential ramif… [+3350 chars]

articles.author: Allyson Chiu
articles.title: How to get rid of mosquitoes, and other tips for dealing with these pesky insects - The Washington Post
articles.description: Aside from itchy bites, mosquitoes can transmit a host of potentially deadly diseases to people and animals.
articles.content: We just got through with a pandemic, but we have mosquito endemics every year, said David Brown, technical adviser for the American Mosquito Control Association. The Centers for Disease Control and P… [+7852 chars]
